name: AVPlayerInterstitialEventController
desc: An object that schedules interstitial events for items played by the primary player.

items.name: init(primaryPlayer: AVPlayer)
items.desc: Creates an event controller with a player item.

items.name: var events: [AVPlayerInterstitialEvent]!
items.desc: The current schedule of interstitial events.

items.name: func cancelCurrentEvent(withResumptionOffset: CMTime)
items.desc: Cancels the playback of all currently playing and scheduled interstitial events.
